attributes.review: As a fellow human, I must warn you about this malevolent app. Not only does it take a millennia to download, but once it downloads it fills your phone with spam notifications, emails, messages, etc. It got to the point where I couldn’t be on my phone without getting Trump notifications every 2 seconds😡. Though our president is a non-mysogynistic, non-homophobic, and non-racist king🤩....I constantly got pop-up notifications saying that I had to support Trump or I would be deported to Mexico even though I was born in the U.S.😅 I must also warn you against the horrible newsletter they’ll send you in the mail. Every time I’d open my mail box there was a nasty stench that smelled like fish 🐟 One time I even came home and saw cockroaches coming out of my mailbox!!! Not to mention, some super-top-secret spies broke into my home and kidnapped my Monster High dolls😤They said I had to give Trump free tacos for life or they would kill my ghouls😫. So I went over to my takuache friend’s house and we both pulled up to the tanning salon where the spies were (also where Trump gets his spray-tans....would not recommend unless you want to look a little 🍊). My takuache friend used his super-top-secret takuache call and summoned all the 🦡 once we were there. The takuaches and I were able to take down the spies and infiltrate the tanning salon. Unfortunately, we saw Trump during one of his routine sessions and ew🤢. Anyways, we rescued my dolls and we headed home. So I advise you to NOT UNDER ANY CIRCUMSTANCES DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!! Unless, of course if you want a part of what I underwent. Then you do you boo💅🏼✨ Personally, I would give this app a 0/5 star rating but sadly it isn’t possible. xoxo 💋
attributes.title: A MORBID TRAP😡😤
